name: Pressure Angel Benthia
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Portrait of Pressure Angel Benthia, notable figure of Aquabyssos/Aethermoor, human, adult, realm-specific attire, character-driven emotion, memorable traits, signature environment, painterly fantasy realism, consistent collection style, readable at small sizes, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, painterly character emphasis, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Portrait of Pressure Angel Benthia with evocative background; clear features readable at token size.
revised_prompt: Illustrate an image in a painterly fantasy realism style, consistent with a medieval fantasy setting, devoid of modern tech, and geared towards a tabletop fantasy game similar to D&D 5e. The focus of this image is an adult human character known as Angel Benthia, a notable figure from an aquatic region called Aquabyssos/Aethermoor. She is dressed in realm-specific attire that illuminates her character-driven emotions and her memorable traits. Her surroundings embody her signature environment – an underwater world – complete with effects of subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents. The image captures the essence of pressure-dome materials and highlights the character impressionistically. The color palette is dominated by tones of teals, deep blues, sea-greens, and pearl highlights. The image should be easily readable at small sizes. Please avoid including any embedded text or words unless specified, and refrain from using sci-fi UIs, contemporary signage, photoreal CGI, anime-style elements, and bloom glare.
